body:
To populate this chart you first need to select one of the 5 SASB main Topic by clicking on the corresponding bar on the left-hand chart.

This will then display the sub-topic distribution, providing a more granular distribution per sub-topic.

Looking at this chart you should be able to judge in which proportion each topic is represented throughout the overall company data and the role a sub-topic plays in the ESG scoring process.
